text.section:
A member may retire with a normal service retirement allowance if:
on or before the date of retirement, the member:
has at least 30 years of eligibility service; or
is at least 60 years old; and
the member completes and submits a written application to the Board of Trustees stating the date when the member desires to retire.

On retirement under this section, a member is entitled to receive a normal service retirement allowance that equals one fifty-fifth of the member's average final compensation multiplied by the number of years of creditable service.
